subject: Capturing the standard out of a program that I'm testing
msgSnippet: Does anyone have any examples of code that captures the standard out of a Java program. I am trying to test a program that outputs using
messageBody:
Does anyone have any examples of code that captures the standard out of
a Java program.

I am trying to test a program that outputs using
System.out.print/println and I want to capture this output within my
test.

Thaks in advance. :-)
